title: Introducing: To The Wedding
body:
_(Photo – Olivia Lee)_

**To The Wedding** is the moniker of San Francisco based multi-instrumentalist Lauren Grubb.

As the drummer of Minipop, this is Grubb’s platform to create beautifully haunting melodrama, perfect for the widescreen. First offering _Silver Currents _is a slow burner, bubbling away until a seriously 90′s leaning guitar outro, channeling the vibes of Mazzy Star an Slowdive. Grubb’s voice is the centerpiece of it all, emotive and crooning, drawing you in and leaving you completely encapsulated for the full five minutes and fifty seconds.

Stream _Silver Currents _below:
